inset.description: Set the indentation distance, and the number plus or minus sign controls the direction of indentation. The default indentation is 72px when true is passed (horizontal mode only)
inset.description_zh: 设置缩进距离，数字加号或减号控制缩进方向。传递 true 时默认缩进为 72px（仅限水平模式）

vertical.description: Whether to set divider to display vertically
vertical.description_zh: 是否将分隔线设置为垂直显示

description.description: The text description of divider (horizontal mode only)
description.description_zh: 分隔线的文字说明（仅限水平模式）

slots.name: default
slots.description: Custom content of divider (horizontal mode only)
slots.description_zh: 分隔线的自定义内容（仅限水平模式）
